amendment.description: To make available from Defense Health Program up to $500,000 for a pilot program on troops to nurse teachers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4823 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4823 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S8674-8675; text: CR S8675) To make available from Defense Health Program up to $500,000 for a pilot program on troops to nurse teachers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4823 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4823 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Durbin.
